title: Trump says he's considering a new, narrower travel ban
text: The new directive would be intended to allay the type of chaos that erupted as a result of Trump's Jan. 27 order, which blocked an estimated 60,000 people with valid visas, some while they were in midair and others who were removed from planes bound for the U.S. before takeoff. The federal court rulings against Trump cited the rough implementation of the order in staying it.
summary:
The new directive would be intended to allay the type of chaos that erupted as a result of Trump's Jan. 27 order, which blocked an estimated 60,000 people with valid visas, some while they were in midair and others who were removed from planes bound for the U.S. before takeoff.
The federal court rulings against Trump cited the rough implementation of the order in staying it.
